sentences.english: He went to see his aunt last night.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天晚上去看望了姨母。

sentences.english: Her aunt made it a matter of high but easy irony , or comedy .
sentences.chinese: 她的姨母把尖锐而轻松的讽刺或嘲笑赋予了这个概念。

sentences.english: The all theses all get busy my mother's aunt, Wan Qin.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都源于我的姨母，浣沁。

sentences.english: The man had once been Aunt Cordelia's sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 那人一度是科迪莉亚姨母的恋人。

sentences.english: It was promised to Susan by her aunt as a Christmas gift.
sentences.chinese: 这东西苏珊的姨母已答应作为圣诞礼物送给她了。

sentences.english: He did not take the flight and his aunt died two days later.
sentences.chinese: 他没有搭乘航班，两天后，他的姨母去世了。

sentences.english: But Aunt Josephine came to his rescue.
sentences.chinese: 但约瑟芬姨母来援救他了。

sentences.english: Aunt Lena has just left for America.

definition: wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
wife of older male cousin via female line
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
